name: Luna (itch) (Cybermoon Productions)
description:
Luna is a 2D rogue-like game made by a group of students for a project. We had a year to create Luna, and in that time we also added an artist to our group. Luna was created in Unity.

Luna is about a futuristic cyber world where the main character, Luna, must escape the enemies coming after her. Players must fight and explore their way through the levels in hopes of being able to make it out in time.
